componentDescription: A text input field for multi-line text editing with customizable features.

colorScheme.description: Optional color scheme for the component.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the text area when initially rendered.

error.description: Indicates whether the text area has an error state.

isEditable.description: Determines if the text area is editable.

helperText.description: Helper text that appears below the text area.

id.description: Unique identifier for the text area.

isReadOnly.description: If true, the text area is read-only.

isDisabled.description: If true, the text area is disabled and cannot be interacted with.

isAutoFocus.description: If true, the text area will automatically focus when the component is mounted.

isMultiline.description: Determines if the text area allows for multiple lines of input.

label.description: The label for the text area.

maxRows.description: Maximum number of rows the text area can expand to.

maxCols.description: Maximum number of columns the text area can display.

name.description: Name attribute of the text area element.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the text area when it is empty.

onChange.description: Callback function triggered when the value of the text area changes.

onChangeText.description: Callback function triggered when the text within the text area changes.

onBlur.description: Callback function triggered when the text area loses focus.

onFocus.description: Callback function triggered when the text area gains focus.

size.description: Size of the text area, typically affecting its height.

shadow.description: Shadow or elevation applied to the text area, or custom CSS properties for the shadow.

shape.description: Shape of the text area, affecting the border-radius.

styles.description: Custom styles for the text area component.

value.description: The value of the text area.

variant.description: Variant of the text area, typically affecting the visual style.
